page.title: 17PILGRIM FATHERS(RELIGION).
page.content: {RELIGION}THE PILGRIM MOVEMENT ORIGINATED IN RECTORY AND CHURCH OF BABWORTH(NEAR RETFORD),WHERE RICHARD CLIFTON BECAME PARSON IN 1586.WILLIAM BREWSTER AND WILLIAM BRADFORD WHO WERE BOTH PASSENGERS ON THE MAYFLOWER WERE OFTEN IN THE CONGREGATION.THE CHURCH IS SET IN BEAUTIFUL COUNTRYSIDE NORTH OF THE A620 RETFORD-WORKSOP ROAD,ABOUT ONE MILE WEST OF RETFORD.CLIFTON WAS THE MAN WHO LED THE PILGRIM FATHERS FIRST TO HOLLAND AND THEN TO AMERICA IN 1620.THE CHURCH IS SURROUNDED BY WOODLAND WITH MANY LITTLE PATHS RUNNING THROUGH THEM.THE CHURCH IS SMALL AND BUILT OF GREY STONE. THE AREA WE NOW KNOW AS BASSETLAW PROBABLY SUPPLIED THE ARCHITECTURAL TRADITION WHICH INSPIRED THE COLONISTS IN THEIR FIRST ATTEMPTS AT BUILDING IN NEW ENGLAND.
